item.title: Imperial Surfers go to Devon: Westward ho!
item.author: Alexander Karvelas,
item.description: Surfing The first weekend of November saw 28 Imperial students hit the coast of north Devon for a weekend of surfing and initiation activities. The trip was the first of the new academic year and saw 16 newbies join the surfsoc veterans to hit the November swells. The trip down was an unexpectedly â€¦
